text: (mesē) biya vūvangen (jōṣuvā, kālēf namæti) dedenā kerehi allāh dayāva pahaḷa kara tibuṇi. ovun (anit ayaṭa) “oba (ovungē śaktiya gæna biya novanu). ovunṭa viruddhava (ema nagarayē) edāraṭuva tek yanu. ehi oba ætuḷu vū vahāma niyata vaśanēma oba jayagrahaṇaya karannehuya. oba (satya) viśvāsavantayin vaśayen siṭinnehu nam allāhvama viśvāsa karanu” yayi pævasūha
